title: FuroX Team 2 Looking for Analyst
body:
looking for an analyst to attend trainings and give post game feedback. experience is preferred but not required (we have staff who can train you). trainings are 6.00pm - 10.00pm four nights a week.

add burstfire303 in game to organize a quick 5 minute interview. even if you dont think you will get in it never hurts to apply! <3

current team roster:
top - furox whatsy
jungle - furox nathan
mid - idkskillz
adc - tbc
support - furox warboss

burstfire303 - league of legends manager for FuroX

replies.body:
I don't suppose it would be possible for me to do this without a microphone?
But if that's neither here nor there, I'm keen to get my hands dirty with some analysing.
